entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
